amendment.description: To require a report on Air Force safety requirements for Air Force flight training operations at Pueblo Memorial Airport, Colorado.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4525 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4525 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Allard. (consideration: CR S6377-6392; text: CR S6382) To require a report on Air Force safety requirements for Air Force flight training operations at Pueblo Memorial Airport, Colorado.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4525 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4525 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Allard.
